name: Autoproject
description:
This is another project management for vim. 
It scans all Makefile.am files recursively for SUBDIRS, _HEADERS and _SOURCES entries and displays all found files and directories in a window left of the codewindow. 
If you select a file, it is opened.
install_details:
Copy autoproject.vim to ~/.vim/plugin
Open project window with F9 in a automake-based project directory

versions.release_notes:
Changes: 
- color support added (copy syn-autoproject.vim to ~/.vim/syntax)
- processing of variables in Makefile.am and makefile
- Makefile.am and configure.in are displayed
